general_info.summary: This document outlines various aspects of Sharda University, including its academic programs and schools (Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, Nursing Science & Research) for the 2025-26 program year. It also lists key administrative and student-focused initiatives such as Examination Annual Reports, Academic Bank of Credits, Curricula Feedback, University Brochures, and various development programs in skills, communication, and entrepreneurship. The document also touches upon university governance, historical information, tenders, legal frameworks, COVID-19 related information, counselling services, FM radio operations, visa and insurance guidelines, a mentoring portal, recruiters, banking services, and mentions international campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, along with specific course offerings and cyber crime reporting.

career_path.summary: This text outlines a career path available after completing a course, specifically mentioning the role of a Personal Banker. It also highlights that students from this program are typically placed with an average annual salary package ranging from 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA, and encourages individuals to consider this as an opportunity for a career in basic sciences.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Personal Banker
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in basic sciences.
